name: Journey Of Gears
description:
This game is a puzzle game where you have to chain gears to go to the next level. 

At the beginning of the game, a small area is open to you, but as you progress you will be able to see new details and nodes of the game. 

Controls: use your mouse to move and connect the white gears with others.

The prototype has only 1 level so far, sorry.

Unfortunately, the HTML version may have several glitches on your browser (no music for example), so you may download the computer version.
